snippet.title: Unboxing the Cryptic Killer Launch Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The first look at our upcoming co-op puzzle game, Unboxing the Cryptic Killer, is finally here! With a new trailer, comes an official launch date. 

Unboxing the Cryptic Killer is set to launch on April 27th, 2023! 🎉🎮

Get ready to team up with your friends and solve some mind-bending puzzles as you unravel the ongoing mystery of the Cryptic Killer. If you're one of the lucky few who have previously played our web game "Unboxing the Mind of a Cryptic Killer", this is a new, remastered version of the experience for iOS, Android and Steam, and will feature new puzzles, content, and some exciting twists.

So mark your calendars, tell your friends, and get ready to dive into the world of Unboxing the Cryptic Killer on April 27th!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2069040/Unboxing_the_Cryptic_Killer/
